Package com.knockk.api.data.repository

Interface FriendshipRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<FriendshipEntity,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<FriendshipEntity,UUID>
public interface FriendshipRepository extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<FriendshipEntity,UUID>
Interface for the friendship repository
Author:
graceradlund

  • Method Details

    • findByResidentIdAndNeighborId

      @Query("SELECT * from \"Friendship\" WHERE (invitor_id = :residentId AND invitee_id = :friendId) OR (invitor_id = :friendId AND invitee_id = :residentId)") Optional<FriendshipEntity> findByResidentIdAndNeighborId(UUID residentId, UUID friendId)
      Finds if the two residents are connected
      Parameters:
      residentId - : id of the resident (user)
      friendId - : id of the friend
      Returns:
      a FriendshipEntity if one exists

    • updateFriendship

      @Query("UPDATE \"Friendship\"SET accepted = :isAcceptedWHERE (invitor_id = :invitorId AND invitee_id = :inviteeId)") int updateFriendship(UUID invitorId, UUID inviteeId, boolean isAccepted)
      Updates a friendship.
      Parameters:
      invitorId - : id of the resident who sent the friend request
      inviteeId - : id of the resident receiving the friend request
      isAccepted - : if the friendship is accepted or no
      Returns:
      the number of rows updated

    • addFriendship

      @Query("INSERT INTO \"Friendship\"(invitor_id, invitee_id, accepted ) VALUES (:invitorId, :inviteeId, :isAccepted) returning id") UUID addFriendship(UUID invitorId, UUID inviteeId, boolean isAccepted)
      Creates a friendship.
      Parameters:
      invitorId - : id of the resident who sent the friend request
      inviteeId - : id of the resident receiving the friend request
      isAccepted - : if the friendship is accepted or no
      Returns:
      the id of the friendship

    • deleteFriendship

      @Modifying @Query("DELETE FROM \"Friendship\" WHERE (invitor_id = :residentId AND invitee_id = :friendId) OR (invitor_id = :friendId AND invitee_id = :residentId)") int deleteFriendship(UUID residentId, UUID friendId)
      Deletes a friendship. Modifying annotation indicates the data will be modified
      Parameters:
      residentId - : id of the resident who wants to delete the friendship
      friendId - : id of the friend the resident no longer wants to be friends with
      Returns:
      the number of rows deleted (should only by 1)
